It looked like a used table that hadn't been cleaned up after, ew. Only later we realized the stains were permanent. But still, so off putting. Also, due to a major goofup on the reception's part, we waited 2 hrs for our breakfast to arrive the next morning which meant we were confined to our room on a day we could've spent exploring the area. They were nice enough to give a late checkout tho.

title: Great trip~
text:
Beautiful hotel, everything was well thought out from the rooms, to the common spaces and the gym/spa. 
Our massages were amazing and the spa staff was courteous and welcoming. Our  ONLY complaint was how slow the elevators were and the breakfast seemed overpriced - $35 for a bagel and lox was much more than expected. Everything else was fabulous. We will be back.

title: weekend get away
text: Excellent hotel. The amenities were perfect and the staff was amazing. So professional. From the arrival at the door, to the valet person and the greeting once we were inside made us feel so comfortable. The reception staff was equally awesome.

title: Stay Review
text: Our short stay at Equinox was amazing. The room was impeccable and the service/amenities were out of this world. I would highly recommend for anyone traveling to NY to visit. I can’t wait to go back in the future

title: Had an amazing stay.
text: This property is BEAUTIFUL. The service was amazing, the food / room service was great, and they do an incredible job taking COVID safety measures. Such a luxurious little escape with a helpful and attentive staff.

title: Excellent stay!!
text: My husband and I loved our stay at the equinox during covid the hotel was very clean and staff was amazing. Especially Andy he was so helpful with our bags and car he was extremely friendly and helpful and on point with everything that we asked. Thank you Andy!!! The spa was amazing as well and their staff. Loved everything about the equinox.

title: Thank You
text: The team was incredibly thoughtful and helpful. Aaron at the front desk was very polite and the gentlemen on the first floor were great. A security guard who let me into my room after I locked myself out was so friendly and understanding. Everyone was very helpful and polite.

title: Incredible!
text: So luxurious and amazing location. Staff was also incredible, especially during covid. The hotel was impeccably clean and I felt comfortable and safe for my whole trip.  This is my new NYC go to hotel!

title: Highly Recommend
text:
Chose the hotel for a staycation for my birthday, and I cannot recommend it enough! The front desk was super accommodating and made sure I felt taken care of. Given the pandemic, I believe the staff went above and beyond to make sure all guests felt safe. 

My stay was early in the week so I was unable to use the Spa services but between the gym and just the standard hotel accommodations was enough. I will say next time I visit I definitely want to explore the spa services! 

Again can't recommend this hotel enough and can't wait for my next visit.

title: Hip new hotel in the center of Hudson Yards
text: This new hotel is in the heart of Hudson Yards which is mid-town just under the Broadway theater district.  It is easy to get to other parts of the city from here or you can stay and enjoy all that Hudson Yards has to offer.  The hotel has the Equinox gym and classes on site, a beautiful spa, glamorous and high tech bedrooms.

title: The Equinox experience
text: A beautiful property with nice amenities, great food, on point and quick service, and not to mention the views of the Hudson River and Hudson yards. Love that it is healthy life focused being equinox.

title: AMAZING STAY!!!
text: This hotel is so amazing!! I would highly recommend staying here! The indoor and outdoor pools are so nice, relaxing and upscale. The decor is so updated, and everything feels so new, clean and fresh. The restaurant electric lemon is very upscale, and has variety of food options. The rooms have amazing views of the city, and are so clean! Sheena from guest services/front desk, was so helpful and friendly. She made our stay even more enjoyable. She was very knowledgeable about the surrounding area as well!  My family and I were celebrating my birthday, and she made us feel so special and welcomed. In addition, Anabela from concierge was also so helpful when finding us dinging options during our stay. She was so helpful in making a reservation for us! She was very knowledgeable about the restaurants in NYC and had amazing recommendations. She spent a lot of time researching restaurants for us, which is very appreciated. She was so generous with her time. She was so kind and helpful as well. Both of these ladies went above and beyond! If you are considering going to this hotel, don't think about it any longer, just go!

title: Drop everything and stay here right now.
text:
+ Gorgeous room with an amazing view. So many amenities I didn't expect (yoga mat, workout clothes, Apple TV, etc.), and I don't think I've ever stayed in a hotel with that nice a view. It was nice despite it being overcast most of the time.
+ Delicious food; it was hard for me to choose whether I should order out or just get room service for every meal.
+ Incredible staff service. The concierge went above and beyond to accommodate me and my requests.
- No desk...? The one criticism of the room would be the lack of a desk. It was uncomfortable using my laptop in bed, and using it on the coffee table wasn't ideal as there was nowhere to plug in my laptop.
- The order time for the breakfast menu seemed unclear. I was told breakfast ended at noon, but on the menu it said breakfast ended at 11. This made ordering breakfast a little difficult, but luckily the kitchen staff called to double check and were able to fulfill my order ASAP.

title: Exceeded Expectations
text: Booked the hotel for a little getaway. Was skeptical since this was their first location. However it was phenominal. From the gentleman TJ at the front, to the front desk and spa people knowing your name before you even get there I was blown away. The gym and and everything is top notch. Anabela at the concierge really helped make the weekend over the top. Will def be back

title: Fantastic Staff
text:
I had my suspicion when booking the stay, given how new Equinox is in the field of accommodation. But I have to admit I was pleasantly surprised. Each one of the staff I met was friendly, professional, and responsive to the requests, and the service in general is on par with, if not exceed, other established luxury hotel brands.

The junior suite I got is modern and elegant, and the bed quality is great. The only thing I don't like its lack of a proper desk. I understand Equinox is about work-out and lifestyle, but a desk that I can occasionally work with my laptop on will be much appreciated.

title: Luxury at its finest
text: Amazing. From the service to the food, everything was fantastic. You get great nights sleep. I will come back in the summer time to get to experience the pool and Terrance once Covid dies down. Highly recommend!

title: Equinox stay
text: The hotel room was nicely appointed and spacious. The views were spectacular! overlooking the Hudson River and The Vessel in Hudson Yards. The service was very responsive, professional and fast. All request were met with a smile. I would highly recommend this hotel and would stay there again.

title: Wonderful staycation in NYC
text:
My BF and I had a wonderful staycation at the Equinox Hotel. For two local New Yorkers, Hudson Yards is not a neighborhood we frequent; it's very commercial and tourist-centric, not unlike the Financial District. The block surrounding the hotel was packed with tourists visiting the adjacent Vessel and mall. If you're looking for a crowd-free location with lots of transportation options, this is not the spot for you.

That said, the hotel itself was incredibly quiet and well-maintained. Service was excellent. The hotel called me a day in advance to book gym reservations, secure a check in/checkout time, and arrange for contactless room cleaning. I also appreciated the hotel security. We were greeted at the door every time we entered the building and required to have our temperature taken.

Everything during our stay went smoothly. I have never been to an Equinox gym so can't compare it, but the 4th floor gym was impeccably clean with multiple staff members on hand to assist guests and wipe down equipment. We loved our room, which was a lower cost "city view" but looked out onto the mall and had an angled view of the Vessel. We splurged on a massage at the spa, where we were treated like royalty and left feeling more refreshed than ever.

Indoor dining has been closed in NYC, and we weren't in love with any food options in walking distance. Granted, this might be because we're foodies and know the NYC dining scene very well. We opted for restaurants a short cab ride away in Chelsea and the West Village. But if you're looking for top-quality eats, Hudson Yards is not a great neighborhood IMO. Electric Lemon, the hotel restaurant, was closed except for takeout, so we're excited to try it once it reopens in full.

We were disappointed to find out that the hotel terrace was closed for the season, so we didn't get any panoramic views of the city. Other than that, we had the PERFECT trip and literally sat speechless on the ride home. I'd do a staycation here again in a heartbeat.

title: NYE 2021
text: We stayed for NYE and the first day of 2021 with spouse and 3 yr old. View of the city was great but no fireworks this year due to covid. Some of the areas of the hotel were closed due to covid. But the room set up was great with very comfy beds and couch. Location next to vessel and mall is great! Very friendly staff!

title: Celebration
text:
Love this is place great location next to the vessel, edge and shopping mall.
Very relaxing and comfortable home away from home. It have everything you need from pool, restaurant, spa, sauna, gym plus a very nice view of the city

title: Staycation for the weekend.
text: I live in NYC but took a staycation to rest and work out. Beautiful rooms and great service. The view of the river from the high floor rooms are also beautiful. Highly recommend for a safe way to escape during this craziness.

title: Best hotel ever!!!
text: My girlfriend recommended the Equinox hotel for my trip to NYC to see my son. From the moment I arrived, I was treated like royalty. Even my son who came to visit commented that the staff knew who he was and was so friendly. My room was amazing and room amenities were one of a kind. I especially loved the workout drawer of supplies!   Anything I needed was taken care of and immediate. The staff was always positive, polite and accommodating. I will definitely stay here again. Loved the location too!

title: Amazing experience
text: Had an amazing stay. Fantastic gym. Amazing room. Amazing food. Great customer service and a decent price for the value! I already have recommended the stay to many of my friends and will be sure to book for a return visit in the future!

title: 5 Star Luxury Hotel- with a focus on wellness and health.
text: Elegant handsome design. Rooms are well appointed. Lights and room controls are user friendly. Complimentary in-room work out accessories and classes at your fingertips. Great service. Attentive staff. Good midtown location for shopping and sightseeing. Excellent Spa. Felt safe and secure.

title: Incredible experience
text: I booked this new hotel for my husband’s 50th birthday and we were not disappointed. Everything is brand new and immaculate. The lobby, the gym and of course the room was modern and elegant, with brand new modern conveniences. The hotel was much less than 50 percent occupied, they had great covid protocols, and we felt very safe as a result. Because the hotel was not full, they gave us an upgrade to a room with a beautiful view of the river. Last but not least, the concierge, Anabela, went above and beyond for us, making dinner, massage and even soul cycle reservations for us. We loved the hotel, the spa (the heated massage bed is a treat), the gym, the pools and the other public spaces. We will definitely be back!

title: Great Stay
text: My wife and I decided to try out the Equinox during a work trip to the city in September. Obviously, given the pandemic, travel feels an awful lot different these days. The Equinox (and Nathan in particular) went above and beyond to keep us safe AND comfortable during our stay. The rooms are spotless and new (great tech). The views are fantastic and the service was some of the best we've experienced anywhere. The area around the hotel (Hudson Yards) is still under construction but we didn't experience any noise or aggravation on that front. Highly recommend this hotel.

title: Wonderful hotel stay
text: This hotel is In a fantastic location. Staff is very friendly, accommodating and professional. Top notch all around.I enjoyed using the gym here too. Great views! Restaurant is closed but breakfast in room dining was really good.

title: Family getaway
text: My family had a lovely stay at the hotel. The entire staff went beyond any expectations we had. As soon as we arrived were gracefully greeted and instructed on were to go, all the staff at reception answered all of our questions and booked our gym passes and helped us with a late check out. The view from the room was nice, although we’ll have to return once construction around the area is finished. The food at the restaurant and in room dining was delicious and even when we left the valet helped us with our luggage while we did a last round through Hudson Yards.

title: High-End Luxury Hotel with amazing amenities and staff
text: Equinox blew our mind away.  We had a 2 bedroom suite and it was high-end and modern.  The staff was also very nice and helpful.  We also used the gym which followed all COVID guidelines and was clean and easy to get to.

title: Outstanding service and visit
text:
Stayed at the Equinox for more than a week on business. Could not have had a better stay, with better service, throughout my entire time. Nathan was in touch every day to ensure I had everything I needed, the Covid precautions made everything feel extremely comfortable and very safe. All in all, I felt at home the entire stay, didn't want for a thing and was always one call or email away from having any answer I needed. 
Overall outstanding experience.

title: Pure bliss
text: I had the most amazing experience at the Equinox Hotel.  It's all in the details at this luxury hotel.  If you are into health and wellness, this is the hotel for you.  I have never slept so well in my life.  Highly recommend.

title: Luxury hotel with amazing service
text: We had the perfect birthday celebration weekend at the Equinox. The rooms are comfortable and modern with all amenities you can think of. Everyone working there was extremely attentive and professional. Anabela at concierge was an absolute angel, her knowledge and expertise made our stay better than expected. The services at the spa are fantastic and well worth it. Thank you for a great stay!

title: Beautiful place and great service
text: We had a wonderful stay at the Equinox. From the moment we arrived, TJ, our valet made us feel right at home. He went above and beyond to help us find great pizza and make us comfortable in the room. The room was clean and beautiful and the healthy amenities in the room were such a great touch!! The staff was attentive and practiced safe measures. I would highly recommend it as a relaxing, welcoming and safe place to stay.

title: Fantastic stay
text:
Celebrated a special birthday at this wonderful hotel.    We slept great as you hardly hear a thing from the outside or other guests, and the beds were very comfortable.  
The Hotel felt very safe during these Covid times.  It was very clean and was a happy place to serve as our home base in NYC.  The location is wonderful.  The staff was superior, especially the concierge Anabela, who not only took care of all the details, but did so as if we were family.  
I highly recommend the Equinox Hotel and look forward to returning.

title: LOVED
text:
Love Hudson Yards and all it has to offer.
Service, cleanliness, and view.....
All top notch.
Will return each time I come back to NYC 

Dumb that Trip Advisor Needs a minimum of 200 words. A reason I might not review in the future.

title: Equinox Hotel - Exceeded My Expectations
text:
Beautiful hotel and well located. This will be my first choice for all future visits to NY. The rooms were spacious and modern with beautiful views of the Hudson River. 

In terms of amenities and services, I was very happy with the service provided by the front desk and guest services team. Nathan was extremely accommodating and helpful. He addressed every concern and request promptly. He made sure that my stay was as comfortable as possible. Thank you Nathan!

title: Impeccable service and luxury
text:
We have stayed at the Equinox hotel multiple times prior to Covid and twice since Covid in March…This hotel is expensive but worth every bit… Especially now during Covid.  Staff goes beyond to ensure the health and safety measures for every guest are met & Customer service is second to none.  
The location is perfect - walking distance to everything & we feel safe walking around the Hudson yards area… most importantly the hotel was extremely clean and I felt very safe staying… We will be back!

title: NA
text: Nathan at Equinox hotel created the perfect experience for me to have a little break from everyday life! I was set up with a gorgeous view and the hotel and room itself are all top of the line. Everything is perfectly curated. All the employees were so kind and always remember your name!  Great location across from the mall for some shopping and dinner before relaxing in the room. I will definitely return!

title: Wonderful Staff
text: This is a great hotel, made truly unique by Nathan and his team, especially the security team. We stayed at the hotel as a staycation with our 2 young daughters and were very disappointed to learn that children are not allowed in the hotel's pool. Nathan went out of his way to make it up to our girls - not that it was his fault in any way - and we couldn't have been happier.  We also felt completely safe during this time of COVID. We LOVED the hotel! Thank you Nathan!

title: Modern, Clean, Attention to Detail
text: Welcoming staff and well designed rooms - felt modern yet warm, interior design felt unique and thoughtful. Rooms were spacious enough for NYC and have plenty of storage space. Bedding was a bit lower than expectations but still slept well. Having spa and gym, as well as nearby attractions were convenient. Would return for the spa alone, excellent service there

title: Brilliant hotel - location perfect .
text:
My Husband and I stayed at the Equinox last week to celebrate our wedding anniversary . It wa s the first time we had been away during Covid . The Equinox was such a wonderful experience - the staff were excellent and they had taken such precautions for safety from housekeeping to room service and the cleanliness was impeccable .
Gorgeous rooms and superb location. .
Special mention - Cindy on reception who booked our stay and Anabela in Conceirge - who made our dinner reservations and took care of all of our needs .
Both so professional and a pleasure to deal with .
We will be returning again , 
Thankyou for such a wonderful getaway and celebration of our 20th wedding anniversary .

title: Stellar Service and Amenities in a Gorgeous New Hotel in Hudson Yards
text: My family and I decided to arrange  a small birthday celebration for my sister and the Equinox couldn't have made a more ideal home base. The hotel itself is absolutely gorgeous, boasting a clean, contemporary design and offering stunning views of the river and the city.  Our spacious and airy rooms were immaculate and the hotel's Covid-19 protocols made us feel 100% safe during this uncertain time. The front desk staff did everything in their power to make us feel welcome and cared for. The hotel's restaurant is ideal for outdoor/rooftop dining, too, and the food is exquisite. We enjoyed many long walks along the river and the neighborhood is ideal for dining and shopping. The next time we return to the city, the Equiniox will be our first choice once again!  Nathan also helped me numerous times with printing of birthday speeches and other much-appreciated assistance.

title: Beautiful hotel
text: Hotel is extremely clean, new, chic.  Views and sunsets from our room were incredible.  Housekeeping did an immaculate job.  Josh was accommodating and did everything he could to make our stay right. We will definitely be staying here again.

title: So accommodating
text: So accommodating!!! So friendly!! Allowed early check in and whenever I needed something somebody was knocking on my door within minutes!! Can’t thank them enough truly the best service I have ever received.

title: An extremely relaxing  escape and retreat in NYC
text:
With rooms that feel like a personal spa retreat, floor-to-ceiling windows that capture the city view or Hudson River view- Equinox is a an escape within the bustle of Manhattan. The decor is a combination of  aesthetically pleasing modern and practical. Very good use of space and smart use of technology and lighting in rooms that are spacious and with plenty of closets and drawers.

Above all the staff is very attentive, kind and super welcoming. Nathan L. at the hotel went above and beyond to make us feel welcome asking prior to our arrival, what they could do to welcome us and our daughters. He went above and beyond to ensure we had a bowl of fruits for our children, bottles of water and a lovely welcoming note.

The attention to detail is impressive at Equimox, and with the backdrop news of covid cases increasing, we never felt uneasy staying at the Equinox. The staff all wore masks and the hotel made sure to have Sanitizers everywhere. Guests were also required to wear masks in public spaces. 

It was a lovely experience and we are looking forward to returning during the holiday season.

title: An escape from real life.
text: Everything in this hotel has been thoughtfully selected and while it was at the top of our budget: it honestly felt worth every single dollar. My husband’s 40th birthday will be a fantastic memory for years to come.

title: Wonderful Except for Fitness Center Danger!!!!!!!!
text: We had a wonderful time at the Hotel. Everyone was incredibly attentive, the room service was lovely and the concierge could not of been more helpful. BUT!!!!!!!! We went to the outdoor pool at roughly 11:00am which had no staff or life guard present so we had to ask someone from management to be present. Then when leaving the pool they have no entry mats to dry off my sneakers leading to the stair case or great anti slip treads on the stair case or even simply a caution slippery when wet sign. So, I slipped and fell down the stair case. Thank goodness I am young (27)  so I did not get too severely injured but someone more senior could be have been incredibly injured and Equinox would have a huge negligence lawsuit on their hands. I hope they fix this before someone else gets severely injured. I'll take a bruised tailbone over a broken neck any day.

title: Excellent service and amenities at The Equinox Hotel
text: I recently had to go to NYC to help a family member.  I usually stay in Soho or the Upper East Side but I decided to try the Equinox Hotel.  The hotel completely surpassed by expectations.  I loved the beautiful location next to the Hudson Yards, the lovely outdoor space and the service was absolutely perfect.  All this, and the rooms are amazing.  The sleep experience is incredible.  Despite being high technology the room was easy to navigate with an iPad controller. I easily changed the temperature, turned off and on the lights, ordered room service and controlled the shades.  Needless to say, this is the hotel I will be staying at when I am in NYC in the future.

title: Great Stay
text: The room my friend and I stayed at was beautiful, clean and had a gorgeous view of the Hudson River. And being an Equinox Hotel the amenities were top notch. But what really stood out was the excellent staff. Especially given the pandemic, there are many hoops to jump through to make sure the guests feel safe and comfortable, and everyone at the hotel went above and beyond to ensure we felt that way throughout our stay.

title: Excellent Service
text: Felt safe and well serviced at this beautifully designed property in Hudson Yards. Super comfy bed and great room amenities. The location is great, easy access to shopping. Great choice for fitness minded travelers, the gym is top notch.

title: A Space for Time
text: Equinox Hotel is another expression of ever-increasing experience economy. They differentiate their image and brand values as “substance with style.” They are going for premium -- through design, connectivity, technology, exclusivity. Staying there is a statement of performance – an intention of getting more out of your life. It is not about being “easy” or “comfortable” – it is a deliberate and rewarding choice. When considering the unique character and context of the hotel we must first understand that cities are increasingly compact, hectic and can even be argued as inhospitable. Urban dwellers are in desperate need to escape from their environments and enter a healthy, positive experience where their bodies and souls can thrive.  The "urban-oasis" is a place to rebalance, revitalise and regenerate – a place that encourages the betterment of the physical, mental, spiritual human condition. Subconsciously, everyday actions place a tremendous amount of stress on the body's natural rhythm. To return to a harmonious state of mind from a disconnected one it is imperative to create spaces that listen, understand and respond. Equinox Hotel is how. They have learnt from hospitality experience that due to the demanding nature of our society today is a requirement to innovate design to exceed the expectations of their clientele. In fulfilling their brand, they aspire to create a space and experience for people that is impactful, transformative and timeless by developing individual and group interactions through health-conscious reform in an appropriately cool, stimulating environment; but not for everyone. It is maybe not about the balance between fitness and hospitality, but rather guests train to be at top of our game: at work, like in life. We are urban, modern athletes participating in a luxurious boot-camp sharing with individuals from sympathetic backgrounds and aspirations. Equinox Hotel provides an experience with a space for time to extend the private moments of their lives. Well-designed luxury is synonymous with living well. The thoughtful design transforms the functional into the extraordinary through craftsmanship and innovation. The rooms go beyond the ambiance of a handcrafted environment with the attention to user experience in the form of nimbly designed moments to enhance recovery and restore the urban warrior. In addition, the personal interactions extended by Nathan and his team are tailored unique to each client. The space functions as a sustaining part of daily life. The design and programming of the hotel room and amenity experience afford the user the benefit of space and time properly designed.

title: New! New York experience at Equinox
text:
Unlike the other traditional New York hotels, Equinox offers new style. Hudson Yard has become totally a new place, the hotel has amazing room with plenty of space and view. Moring Yoga class on roof top of the Edge was one of my best experience in NY. Hospitality in the hotel is superb, remembering my name, try to answer all requests from me during my long stay (8 nights), I had my personal assistant via WhatsApp, making my stay wonderful. The experience was pleasant all the way thru and I would like to thank all the Equinox staffs! Hoping to see Equinox in Asia soon, as I will be travelling a lot! Cheers.

title: Perfect stay with all the amenities
text:
I stayed here as a staycation and am so happy I did! The team here has truly thought of everything–from the design of the rooms and common spaces, to the amazing gym and additional amenities. Seriously though, the gym and pool alone are some of the best in NYC. 

Also, even though I visited during COVID times, the stay was truly exceptional. I felt safe and taken care of and the safety protocols were always enforced. 

Would highly recommend!

title: Simply Impeccable
text: My wife and I stayed in the fall. The service was exceptional as expected. The hotel is beautiful. My wife loved all the small touches from the grown alchemist shower products to the curated items in the roombar. We discovered the surrounding neighborhood together and took a wonderful walk along the highline. We even did a soulcycle class and she ended our staycation with a trip to the spa while I worked out in the club.

title: Made a surprise birthday staycation memorable
text: My  birthday travel plans were deterred by COVID but were quickly remedied by an awesome staycation experience my husband put together with the help of the Equinox hotel team (shoutout to concierge, Nathan).  Every little moment was a welcome surprise from the personal touches when I first walked into our spacious hotel room overlooking the hudson river—a gorgeous floral arrangement, personal phots framed an sprinkled around the room along with a welcome treat—to the services arranged where everyone was on top of their game—seats at the pool, lovely massage treatment at the spa (i'm def going back!).  Thanks again to the equinox for making my birthday memorable.

title: Above and Beyond
text:
Our engagement was postponed due to Covid in March so when the Equinox Hotel reopened it was the perfect opportunity to pop the question. Nathan and the hotel team helped plan an incredible weekend I could have never put together myself. I can't thank them enough for their hospitality and attention to every detail.

The hotel location, guest rooms, restaurant, bar, outdoor terraces and wellness facilities are wonderful. (The spa and cryotherapy are a must when you stay!) We felt safe with the enhanced cleaning and sanitation efforts throughout the experience. 

We can't wait to be back. - JS

ps: She said yes!

title: The Rejuvenating Staycation
text: My experience at the Equinox Hotel was incredible! I had planned a family weekend in the city--a staycation--and from the beginning, the hospitality team was instrumental in scheduling and managing our itinerary. The amenities were unique and just what we needed when we didn't know we were looking for them! The staff was attentive but did not hover, which made the experience all the more relaxing. Speaking of relaxing--the spa! Not to be believed! I had incredible new experiences that I will return again and again for! Thank you for an amazing stay, I guarantee I will be back!

title: Incredible stay in Hudson Yards
text:
This hotel is magnificent! I stayed here for 5 nights and I wish I could have spend even more time, as it felt so magnificent and lavish from being greeted by sweet and helpful valet, to reception, where each person was so helpful, kind and friendly. I have to say special thanks to Nathan and Anabela, who were helping us with making sure we will arrive safely, setting us up with best reservations, and making sure all our needs were met. Sheena at the reception desk is so friendly and wonderful. We had the best room we could ask for. Junior suite had beautiful views of the Hudson River and view of NY skyline from the other side. It’s exceptional and so comfortable and luxurious. It’s so great to have completely soundproof hotel, making sleep most enjoyable. Loved the products in the room so much so that I had to purchase it from spa. Equinox gym and pool, I used almost daily. That’s where I experienced another great service. You can be at the pool for max of 90 minutes and make reservation in advance. It has East, south and west exposure and it’s facing beautiful views of NY skyline and Hudson Yards. What a gem! I wish weather was nice, would have love to stay there longer for sure!
Breakfast was enjoyed in the room from excellent choices on the iPad. It was contactless giving you feel of complete safety. Please try Electric Lemon, you won’t regret it!!!  Amazing place to enjoy delicious cocktails and food.

I can’t wait to come back and stay at Equinox Hotel, it’s my favorite place in NY!

title: Perfect Equinox Experience
text: From beginning to end everything at the equinox hotel was a fabulous on-brand experience. The staff is wonderfully trained and the management far exceeds any standards for luxury hotels. Naomi and Kristen took care of every thing my partner needed. When there were a few minor technology issue with the room the hotel manager Greg stepped in and went way way above and beyond. Immediately got us in an upgraded room and arranged a car service to dinner for our minor inconvenience. The level of service and professionalism have us ready to go back ASAP. The property is beautiful.The room service is excellent and the access to the Equinox Gym is just the final added bonus. Spectacular view and 35 second walk to the train. 4 minutes to the w 30th Blades Helipad as well.

title: Amazing Experience - Must See & Enjoy Equinox Hotel!
text:
Being a 15+ year equinox member I encourage all members to explore and enjoy the amazing new Equinox Hotel in Hudson Yards NYC. The high quality and service you have grown to love as a member is magnified in each and every aspect of their hotel brand.  The service level started with a welcoming smile and proper safety in these unique times.  The great news is the safety precautions of temperature checks, good hygiene and masks are seamless in their check-in flow.  

All the amenities in the room are tailored to a holistic equinox mentality focus and ease of use and comfort after long days.  The beds are beyond comfortable and help drive a great night of sleep.

The room service food quality, presentation and safe delivery were all refreshing and enjoyable as you relish in the amazing view of the city.

I could go on about more amazing aspects like the great Equinox club downstairs, large pool deck and place to sit outside and enjoy good food but the best way to appreciate it is enjoy it yourself.

title: Luxury at New Heights in NYC!
text: We stayed at The Equinox last evening for a birthday celebration.   The hotel is sleek and stunning.  The team deliverable a veritable luxury experience in light of covid.  The customer recognition was spot on, anticipatory and beyond personal.  I wish all hotels had a customer relationship management system as they do.  It would make all the difference in the world.  The team went out of their way to be accommodating and it was seamless.  I hope that everyone has the opportunity to experience this new version of luxury - you will not be disappointed!

title: Amazing stay
text: Stayed here with my boyfriend Labor Day weekend and can’t wait to go back! Everything was very clean and they had great Covid protocols in place. The pool area wasn’t crowded and the views were amazing. Jinny was very helpful and made sure our time there was perfect. Definitely plan on going back for another staycation!

title: Jewel Crown of Hudson Yards - New York City
text: The property is based at Hudson yards, the new IT place on the island of Manhatten. I booked a room and the reservation call was quite helpful and noted all requests well. When i arrived i was welcomed by a happy team who was kind to give me a room facing the hudson river, The rooms are spacious, with mood lights and toilet amenities froom growth alchemist who has curated a special AM/PM line for the chain, which I loved it peronally. 360 view of the city and so much to do within the hotel that you dont have to leave around much. I spent the evening enjoying the outdoor heated and indoor pools. Since the brand is a pioneer in fitness industry, it was much expected that there will be a a huge gym. I was wrong there a entire floor dedicated to the fitness, huge fancy gym, fitness classes and ofcourse fittest possible trainers. Not only that the pool is quite long which means i lovedit, I am a fan of long pool for laps and i can add this to my fav lap. The views from around the hotel is quite impreesive, in NYC its hard to look out and not see skyscrappers and the best part of this hotel is that it is based correctly away fron the hustle and bustle and across the road to get to the heart of nyc. You are 4 ave away but you dont even have to leave the courtyard if you dont want to as there is a HY mall across with all possible brands and high street brands, fine dinning or if you just want a shake shack, There is a mercado with multiple stalls for food and drinks with great ambience to after work, girls / guy sesh, family scene or a casual date. You get free access to The Vessel if you reside at the hotel with a simple check with concierge. Hotel has the dinning names electric lemon, a outside bar which was my fav and in room dinning, I dined one evening at the outside bar (always a fac with the nyc skyline view) and enjoyed my in bed in room dinning, One thing i enjoy the most isthe in the bed bfast when i travel cause thats a luxury you can only enjoy in hotels. All in all i loved this hotel away from the jungle but steps away, has everything that you need to unwind and has enough to get your heart rate up, great privacy for couples and yet enough to entertain the family and i absolute would visit again.

title: Gorgeous
text: Great hotel! Staff is excellent. Accommodations were amazing. I’d stay here again in a New York minute. Food is excellent. Hudson yards was incredible. Sitting here thinking of better times and wishing I could be on vacation again.

title: Wonderful stay
text:
We stayed for a week as we were attending at an exhibition at Jacob Javits center.
Hotel is beautiful, but the staff working there makes the difference compare to other beautiful hotel in NYC.
From the doorman to the front desk to the concierge (Evelyn) just to name a few are all so attentive, they make you feel really special.
Hotel rooms are really nice and you have enough space, for the price and for NYC standard. We had one facing the river.
Restaurant is good and again, the staff is really nice.
Gym is just great, and the view is so beautiful. 
I also experienced the personal trainer gym which is nice as well. 
While reading this review, consider that I visit NY 2-3 times a year for the last 25 years, both for business and leisure so I tried many hotels in different areas, mostly in East Village or SoHo but this one is unique, I will come back, no question.
Thanks for making my stay so unique, we will come back soon!

title: Staycation of my dreams!
text:
For the birthday of my best friend, I booked a suite and it did not disappoint! The room was extremely well appointed and luxe. The view of the river was spectacular! Above all, the service was incredible. I’ve honestly never felt so looked after at a hotel before. The massive gym and spa were wonderful and while it was too cold to enjoy the outdoor pool, we got to enjoy the pop up saunas on the pool deck.

I brought along my dog as well and he was a bit amongst the guests and staff. They are very pet friendly!

We had about 6 friends over to the suite one evening and each guest was personally escorted to the room which was very nice. As we had brought in a case of champagne, the hotel stored it for us in their walk in fridge and brought us up bottles as needed (much of hospitality $ come from liquor sales so I was impressed at the willingness they had to do this for us because we didn’t buy any booze at the hotel).

Only negative was that I had to check out on Sunday and walk 10 blocks south to my apartment once the weekend was over!

title: Jake's birthday bash
text: I had a wonderful stay my only issue was being denied a table for dinner at the hotel restaurant.  I enjoyed the gym and the spa looked amazing, I will have to check it out next stay.  The blackout shades are the best and the beds are spectacular.

title: The essence  of  beauty
text: If you feel like  treating yourself  for a NY visit, The Equinox Hotel at Hudson Yards  is  right for you. Head and shoulder above other hotels in the same price range, The Equinox offers  undiluted  beauty, sophistication, elegance. Spectacular views   of the Vessel, the  Hudson river, conveniently located to restaurants, shops and the High Line.  Staff extremely helpful and welcoming. Highly highly highly recommended.

title: Fantastic quality but layout needs work
text:
Equinox at Hudson Yards is the epitome of cool . The lobby , restaurant , spa and fitness gym have fantastic modern interiors that make you want to stay to see and be seen .  The gym though accepts outside membership and is frequently full.  All that sweaty people and noise around the gym makes it feel a little sweatshop-like which was not quite what you expect from a swanky 5star hotel at all .  Upon entry to the hotel room there is a long hallway with closets and the coffee maker and selection of tea and nespresso coffee . The chilled bar is heavily stocked .  There is a small living room that’s dark and cozy with a dispenser for water.  Unfortunately , the water was smelly and tasted a little foul.   The furnishings inside the room are plush and comfortable and the view overlooking the yards was simply a sight to behold . The toilet had separate cubicles for the toilet and the shower and the lavatory was very user-friendly with the long counter and drawers . Toiletries come in eco-friendly set up with large pumps and an array of shampoo , body wash and conditioner in the shower .... just read carefully bec it’s very easy to end up interchanging them as they all look alike .   The closet has a huge selection of gym items and some personal items for sale . It is very convenient but pricey as well so watch out , those items are not complimentary!  There is a lighted full body 3 sided mirror that made dressing up so much easier and fun ! 

It is a disappointment though that with all the well thought out quality,  they missed out on some basic conveniences .... the vanity table and chair and/or the working table for those who need to work from their room . As a result it was very frustrating to constantly try to figure where to put your personal items and work items . And doing so on the sofa is not the most conducive to finishing work and can hurt the back after long use . 

It was fun to enjoy a couple of days in equinox and the nearby mall and the Vessel but I would not consider it as the best value for money .

title: Best hotel in NYC
text: What a hotel, I stay in NYC about a week a month, and have stayed in most quality hotels in the last 5 years, well for me without a doubt Equinox is the best hotel in NYC. The staff are superb, thanks Adam, and everyone who made me feel so special, the spa is off the charts, gym superb, won’t stay anywhere else when I am in NYC.

title: Great Location, Wonderful Service and Plenty to look forward to.
text: The location is wonderful, with wonderful views and easy access to Manhattan's midtown and west side.  Service was great -- the hotel staff was attentive. Unlike other hotels though, this hotel has plenty to do within the hotel premisis (in addition to the rest of Hudson Yards), with a gym, sauna's, pool and the bar/restaurant Electric Lemon, which serves up healthy food and delicious cocktails. There was also a DJ playing a great soundtrack!

title: Great experience
text: The rooms are very spacious with beautiful decor and super comfy beds.  I stayed over New Years Eve, and my friends and I enjoyed hanging out in the room, ordering room service, and then heading downstairs to enjoy some drinks at the bar.  The staff is also very accommodating and friendly. Highly recommend!

title: Placed in Wrong Room Type
text: I booked a normal room, but got placed in a handicap room where the shower wand didn't even reach our head. This, despite confirming that we did not want or need a handicap room, in writing, three days before arriving. Mix-ups happen, but the staff refused to put us in another room or offer a single dollar of credit for the poor experience - despite three email follow ups. Very disappointing. Avoid.

title: New Year’s Eve at equinox hotel
text:
My wife and I decided to party it up in the city with some friends for New Year’s Eve. The whole experience was perfect. Everything from the easy to order room service to the super fun multiple level party to ring in 2020. We will be coming back in the future. 

P.s. the bloody Mary’s at the restaurant were just what we needed for our hangovers. ;-)

title: Will definitely be back!
text:
My family, 2 adults & 2 Teens stayed here for one night for an event we had in NYC.  We booked through Amex Platinum which is a little bit of a higher rate but comes with $100 Credit, Breakfast for two and a 4pm late check out.  Well worth it.  The rooms are very well laid out with great amenities.  Very comfortable with 2 double beds.  Others have talked about the rooms so I won't detail but they are great.  However I was a little disappointed and felt price gauged that with our upgrade option thru Amex all the hotel could accommodate was a Suite with 1 King Bed and we would be charged $95 for per roll away bed for our children.  This is ridiculous and should be re-evaluated.  We stay at Four Seasons Hotel all the time and they among all other high end hotels we stay at provide roll away beds for FREE.  Shame on the equinox for charging for this amenity that is standard in comparable hotels.

Other positives are the use of the Equinox Club.  The hotel can book you into the group classes which I took an amazing Vinyasa Class with Melissa on Sunday at 10:15am.  The gym is fairly crowded and so is the indoor pool but it is still very nice.  Also, guest services was quick to provide anything we needed in our room.   Also, the concierge can provide you with daily Vessel tickets so that you don't need to get them in advance.  This is a nice convenience.  

We ate Sunday brunch at Electric Lemon and it was excellent!  Delicious and a nice vibe.  Being across the street from Hudson Yards Mall is great especially since the hotel does NOT provide complimentary coffee in the lobby unlike ALL other high end hotels do.  I realize the hotel is new but based on the pricing, the small amenities like complimentary coffee in the lobby is a minor thing to provide for hotel guests that make them feel special.  
Also the Valet costs $80 a night and you have to give them 45 minutes notice before leaving.  Fortunately, it did not take our car 45 minutes to arrive.  The Bellman are all friendly, helpful and welcoming. The hotel does feel a little cold and awkward with the elevator and lobby switch to come in and out of the hotel to the guest room and there isn't much a lobby but the room amenities, Equinox club and the people who work at the hotel make up for it.  Also, we considered bringing our dog but they wanted $250 a night which I also felt was excessive compared to other hotels that charge $100 a night.
We are local (suburb of the city), and this will definitely be our hotel for future 1-2 night stays in the city when we have events because the rooms and fitness club meet our needs and is an easy uber ride to many locations in NYC.  I hope the hotel will take into consideration lowering some of the price gauging items like the rollaway beds and dog fee stay.

title: Equinox Hudson Yards
text: The room was great. Ammenities were perfect. They thought of everything. I had everythingI needed. Needs a softer more cozy mattress. Charging $10 service fee for in-room delivery is a bit much. My overall stay was really good. I would stay there again.

title: Family
text:
Our visit to the Equinox Hotel at Hudson Yards in New York City was amazing!!!
The restaurant serves delicious healthy food. The hospitality staff are very friendly and went far and beyond in their service!
The spa, pool areas and saunas are so desirable they can keep you there all day and VERY clean.  
Like someone said “It is an oasis in the middle of the city”!
We highly recommend it!

title: Fabulous Property
text: Spectacular new hotel on the NYC scene.  Equinox is meticulously appointed with great attention to detail.  Our one bedroom suite with river view was the most spacious hotel room we've ever had in the City.  The bathroom was sumptuous with large shower and separate water closet. The dressing area was equally grand with floor-to-ceiling views south to Freedom Tower.  My wife gushed over the steamer for clothes and Dyson hair dryer.  The staff could not have been more professional.  Andrew, in particular, was super helpful with reservations.  In-room dining was prompt and courteous.  The restaurant and bar, while pricey, were also top notch.  Overall a fantastic experience and we will return.

title: One major flaw and a few minor ones
text: The staff was great and accommodating, location is prime, and room was a generous size. However the elevator seemed to be a big problem for myself and many of the guests. There are two elevators you must traverse to get from ground floor to room. The wait time was long and on multiple occasions I saw people wait for the next one as the elevator was already jammed tight with people. The pool and gym were overcrowded as well. I believe people with equinox memberships are able to use the hotel facilities which make it less of an exclusive gym even though you are paying exclusive prices for the room. They were also doing construction to the hotel about a few floors below me outside on a terrace and seemed to start at 6 or 7am on a Saturday morning. I understand construction is necessary at times but in a hotel setting I would avoid loud hammering work on a weekend morning.

title: Beautifully Appointed
text: Equinox has thought of everything for this hotel. Beautiful intelligent rooms, comfortable bed, high end linens, quiet, spa level amenities, huge gym, fantastic restaurant and bar, proximity to shopping and helpful, friendly staff.

title: Amazing stay!
text: We had a fabulous experience at the Equinox Hotel Hudson Yards!  Andy and Devon helped with check in and showed us around our room and the hotel. The staff was very attentive and they accommodated our requests for the weekend. Devon even helped us track down our Uber driver when we were leaving for the airport.  The gym was very upscale and the classes were challenging but exciting.  We will definitely stay here again!

title: Hudson River Views
text: The service, from the front door to checkout, was great.  We were greeted on arrival, bags handle, check-in smoothly and keys in hand in minutes.  I stayed in a deluxe king with stunning views of the river.  High end toiletries in the room, rob/slippers, full bar, and a steamer for wrinkles.  fitness attire available in the room for purchase.  The shower has a switch to change the glass from clear to opaque and includes 3 shower heads.  Apple TV. Assortment of other personal items available for a fee.  Large gym but too “stuffy” for my taste😒 the food in the restaurant was really good.

title: Amazing experience
text:
I rated everything as 5 except gym 
I stayed 3 nights and I enjoyed the excellent receptionist and concierge services 
The food with Gluteen free options are excellent 
The room is very comfortable and meant to satisfy athletes and sport people 
The gym is rated 4 as they have outstanding equipment but the welcome service for 1st time visitors is leas than my expectation also during weekend less number or group classes

title: Amazing!
text:
I had the best experience! The hotel super clean and the service was the best I ever seen! The stuff were very friendly and professional. The room was very functional and perfect for deep sleep
Thank you

title: Perfect!
text: Best hotel in NYC.  Room was gorgeous, spacious and so relaxing! We had the corner suite overlooking Hudson.  All amenities were impressive. Service impeccable.   Electric Lemon for breakfast was delicious and healthy. Amazing gym! Can’t say enough!

title: 5 Star Hotel, Restaurant, Bar, Spa, Amenities, Location, Service
text: Ironically, we didn't make use of the gym facilities! There are just so many activities within close proximity. When we got back to the hotel, we nestled into the comforts of the room or took advantage of the cozy lounge areas throughout the hotel. The spa and its' services rival our other 5 star favorite uptown. A shout out to Jasmine, Fang and Machiko- thank you! The staff resembles the cast of Hamilton dressed in business casual and athleisure. They manage excellence in hospitality without seeming rehearsed or stuffy.

title: Loved everything about this hotel
text:
It was a short business trip to NY for the Travel Show. We picked this hotel because it was around the conner form the Jacob K. Javits Convention Center.

- Great service
- We were upgraded upon arrival and it was an absolute treat with the beautiful views of the Vessel and Hudson River
- Great ambience and atmosphere in the hotel
- Definitely would recommend to stay here!

title: Birthday Celebration
text: We chose the Hotel because we wanted a place that was sophisticated, chic and cool and would offer great hospitality as well a location that was close to amazing places to dine shop and explore. Very happy to say that we were not disappointed in any way. The entire staff from the front entrance to the front desk and any other member of the staff went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. Our room was amazing with beautiful views of the Hudson River and the City. Comfortable bed, great bath products. And any issues or if I needed anything the response was handled immediately. Professional staff especially Gregory the Front office Manager was the best. Looking forward to our next visit.

title: I will be back
text:
Very good hotel from design sleep comfort and healthy living perspective.Now my favourite in NYC .

Outdoor space excellent views truly spectacular and the health conscious detail in every aspect awesome

title: Excellence at the Equinox
text: I had the pleasure of staying at the Equinox Hudson Yards for one night and what a night it was. The view of the Hudson from my room was awesome. The staff was top-notch and ready to go above and beyond to make my stay all the more comfortable. The food at the Electric Lemon restaurant was delicious and the Rib-Eye I ordered was succulent and tasty and I can't wait to go back. The Spa is first class and the massage I received was phenomenal (Thanks Machiko)! Even though they have a world class gym with all the bells and whistles one could imagine, I didn't feel forced to work out just because of the name . If you do work out, they have everything you need, I did a Precision Run at 6:30 am and felt challenged at first and accomplished at the end. Overall my stay was one of the best and I thank the entire staff for making my experience a special one.

title: Great new Hotel, slow service
text:
Rooms are amazing! Beautiful setting, beds are wonderful.
Check-in process was a little bit confusing and not as spectacular as you expect when you enter a hotel of that price level. Otherwise one of the best Hotels I've ever stayed in!

title: Has definitely Exceeded our expectations! WOW
text:
When My husband and I travel we always stay at luxurious hotels, this one was SPECIAL! have definitely exceeded our expectations. The building, design, cleanliness was spectacular. very modern every little detail of the hotel was spectacular. HOWEVER the team are way above!! from the first moment we stepped in, to check in, room service, guest service, concierge was above amazing! Every one greets you with a smile, asks if you needed anything and follows up with you to make sure service was provided! Everyone made us feel very welcomed and service was at its peak .
Robbie checked us in was very welcoming, great manners, had a wonderful conversation. He ensured that we were happy with our room and made sure that our 6th anniversary was special! He is such a great asset to the company! A cool modern building without an amazing team is nothing! 
Devon was magnificent knows every corner of NYC with a great positive vibe showed us great spots restaurants etc he even took the time to show us pictures of the spots and directions on how to get there. Thank you! They all made our trip super special thanks for ensuring a wonderful vacation!!! Cant wait to Come back

title: My fantasy hotel -- an amazing experience with an extraordinary staff
text:
My husband surprised me for my birthday with an overnight to the hotel (we live in Brooklyn). This was thrilling beyond because 1. as a mom of a toddler, I pine for the eucalyptus towels of my past, and everything else that made "Chique-uinox" near and dear to me as a member on and off since the mid 90's who dreams of rejoining, and 2. I literally could think of nothing more fun on our 24 hours away (our second solo mini-trip since having a baby) than trying out your new hotel! It is the stuff of my fantasy.

It did not disappoint -- what a beautiful, calming environment with such spectacular attention to detail. Two pools! The separate duvets for each side of the bed! The relaxing "sleep vessels." They thought of every detail.  And yet, as sleek and as "cool" as it is, what was really lovely was how incredibly warm and down-to-earth (and attentive) the staff is.  From Sebastian and Adam - who I gleefully called to book my Precision Run class (which of course I then cancelled once we got the hotel -- who wants to leave the room?), to Robbie and Gregory's warm welcome and follow-up with our requests, Peter -the bartender at the amazing Electric Lemon, who is a world class mixologist and so knowledgeable about the food, but super fun, too -- you have an extraordinary staff. I say this as someone who has traveled and stayed at luxury hotels around the world  -- I am so impressed with the wonderful group of people who work so hard behind the scenes of your hotel. Thank you for making it such a memorable experience for us.

title: Fantastic hotel, bed was hard as a rock
text:
Hotel is wonderful.  Extraordinary nice and helpful staff, lovely room with beautiful views and elegant appointments, superb style and location.

However, for the love of all we humans hold dear, PLEASE OFFER REGULAR MATTRESSES! The "health" mattress in our room was as hard as a rock.  

Such a shame, because it would have been wonderful to sink into an inviting bed in this beautiful hotel at the end of the day.

title: Equinox Hotel
text: Excellent experience! From the time I entered the building, checked in, had lunch, and went to sleep. Everything was exceptional. Equinox is delivering again on their promise to be the BEST. And having a top notch spa, the best-in-class Equinox gym, Soul Cycle, a healthy juice bar, healthy snacks and teas and elixirs in the room - a perfect business trip!

title: Above and beyond expectations
text: I was blown away by the attention to detail from the design but also to the quality of service. I loved finding new things like the towel loops for the shower hooks. The maid service was also exceptional. I had never expected to tidy up clothes that were accidentally left out of place.  Thank you!

title: Excellent
text: Enjoyed everything about the Equinox.  The room, the common areas, the staff.  Pleasurable experience.  Will recommend to business associates, family and friends and would definitely stay here again.  Wishing you much success with your first hotels and others to come!

title: Great stay in the city
text: Equinox hotel is a perfect property for a staycation in the city.  Access to the amazing gym and pool facilities can't be beat.  Restaurant is great - rooms are absolutely gorgeous - we had corner suite with amazing views. The weather was terrible so we didn't do much walking, but from the hotel the only way into the rest of Manhattan is car/taxi.

title: Amazing stay
text: Had such an amazing stay at the hotel. The hotel is stunning and club is beautiful. Thank you to Kristen Mills who went out of her way to ensure we had everything we needed. Definitely will be back!!!

title: First introduction to Hudson Yards
text: I had high expectations and these were absolutely exceed. Magnificent rooms, bars and restaurants. Plus an outstanding location next to The Vessel, opposite a beautiful shopping centre and at the end of the completed Highline. Didn't have a chance to try out the spa and fitness offer - next time!

title: Exceptional Service
text:
My flight was delayed en-route due to weather, and my bags were misplaced by the airline.  I arrive at the hotel, grumpy to a cold New York winter's day, only to have the wonderful guest relations manager organise spare clothes, toiletries and shoes.  Just a wonderful human touch and it was a recurrence of these little touches that made this such a memorable stay.
Every single person I met from Davon and Josh at the door, through to Joshua in Guest Relations, Lorenzo at the gym, and even Nathan the VP of Guest Experience who checked in on my stay, made this an absolutely memorable business visit - business visits shouldn't feel like this, you're normally ushered in and out, but here I carried on my usual routine with a great group of people who apart from their great service were also great fun!
Make no mistake, the rooms are spectacular, the food at Electric Lemon healthy and in great portion size (preventing you from over-indulging), and the gym, what you would expect from an Equinox - extremely well-kitted out!
I can't wait to return to my home away from home in my favourite city!

title: Totally Amazing!
text: I vary rarely write a review even when I love a hotel as I just forget when I get home, which is awful I know but I had to write a review on the Equinox at Hudson Yards to just say wow!  Up until a few weeks before we were staying at a hotel further uptown when we found out that their spa was not open so we decided to change hotels.  All I can say is that I'm very glad that there spa wasn't open as it gave myself and my daughter the chance to find one of my new fave hotels worldwide.  From the bell boy/girl, to concierge, to the guys on the door who went out searching for my uber in 60km winds, the service was top notch and just so warm and friendly.  There was a genuine warmth in everyone's attitudes and demeanour and we just found the whole stay completely faultless.  The location you just couldn't beat right on the high line and walking distance to so many cool places.  I couldn't leave my review though without stressing one point which is so unusual in any city hotel, the rooms are so quiet at night and we both had 5 perfect uninterrupted nights sleep.  Can I please pass on my thanks to absolutely all the staff at The Equinox for giving myself and my daughter a wonderful 5 days in the city that (apparently), never sleeps.  We shall definitely return!

title: My get away
text: Andy and Josh at the front door were amazing.   Along with all the staff .. room was big for nyc ...  the gym was equinox so you already know .. I like that they always had water in room and everything was just NEW and newt ... stay here

title: Small flaws add up to create an average stay. Fourth star is for the excellent service
text:
This Equinox Hotel at Hudson Yards is a beautifully designed hotel with a staff that has received excellent training. Its proximity to high end shopping and other midtown attractions makes it an attractive place to stay. 

From the moment we arrived to the moment we left, the service was excellent. It was obvious that the staff was well trained and that is obviously a key component of what makes a hotel great.

The rooms make an excellent first impression. Some lights automatically go on when you enter the room and the rooms are a good size. But small flaws add up to detract from the stay. 

There's a lot of technology built into the rooms and the entire hotel, and that's a fantastic thing . . . when the technology works. 

Here are the criticisms, some or all of them might be due to user error. But if they are, is the user the one at fault in a hotel room?

We had to move rooms because the heat was not working and they were unable to fix. This stuff happens and we were okay with all of this. The staff, from Front Desk folks to Engineering were very gracious and the Front Desk Manager gave us a $150.00 F&B credit which was very kind, she made it very clear that they wanted us to be pleased with the stay and that was very kind. Still, this entire exercise wasted about an hour.

Our new room did not have the same view that we had initially paid for, but at that point it was more about just getting our stuff into a room and not messing around with these little points. We were still very happy with our stay and understood that any hotel, especially a new one is going to have its problems. 

As our stay progressed, little pesky things added up to us being ambivalent about this beautifully designed place. From our perspective it seemed they put lots of thought and money into the design, but the function part hadn't been thought out completely.

Firstly, the light switches are not backlit or illuminated so, going trying to work the lights by the bed or heading to the bathroom in the night resulted in opening the shades, turning up lights to full, etc. A little backlighting would solve these problems of course. There is an iPad that lets you control the lights as well, but that went dead after a few hours and failed to recharge in the charging station. I tried to trace the wire but it went into a hole in the wall so I just gave up. 

The shower is really nice, with the possibility of using a rain shower head, a normal shower head, or a more directed spray, but you couldn't use any combination of these three things, it was an either or type of thing which seemed odd. And the biggest surprise was that the water pressure in the shower was sub par. Once again, not crucial, but another bunch of little things that added up to us being unimpressed. Towels were great.

Then there was the TV. Turning on the TV gets you directly to an Apple TV. Great! And there is an Apple TV app to let you watch regular channels. Problem is, they froze and buffered constantly, making the TV viewing experience lackluster, so once again, slight disappointment delivering on a nice concept.

Then we wanted to order room service, the TV has an app for hotel services but it kept on locking up when hitting the in-room dining section so we were unable to use this.  Once again, another minor disappointment and failure to deliver on a good concept. We did finally order in room dining and the food was up to par.

So, what we left with was a feeling that they tried really hard to make an amazing hotel but much of the technology and infrastructure was failing them. We discussed this as we left the hotel and as we were chatting about this our elevator doors opened and we saw 3 ladies trying to get into the spa with a key card and looking very bewildered. Once again, if the technology is fantastic but is not intuitive or fails to work, what's the upside?

So, great staff, beautiful spot, aesthetically great, food very good. If we try again, we'll definitely use the gym, spa and other services like that as these are major positive differentiators for this property. We just are unsure if we will try again. :)

Great training of a great staff of people!

title: Stunning hotel
text: This is one of best new hotel after Park Hyatt & Four Season Downtown hotel , love my room , beautiful, spacious, neat and well pointed , this simple clean modern design style just fit me , the bed set so so comfy, super clean smell great ! The only thing I don’t like is the bathroom shower keep dripping bother my sleep , I just put on my ear plug all night . However, the indoor pool awesome, most fun part is hot tube & cold tube next to it , this is the stunning indoor pool in big Apple , can’t use outdoor pool because the snow, the dinner in hotel restaurant was fine just a bit too salty , feel like some of southern taste inside, but the breakfast so so, bread over toasted not worth it. Other thing is : You must go down to 25 floor lobby to switch other elevator to the pool & gym , while u are wearing swimming suite & cover by robe in public, kind of embarrassing and uncomfortable , otherwise this is a one of top hotel I will definitely come back !

I’ve stayed in a few hotels in NYC and The Equinox at Hudson Yards is hands down my favorite hotel. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. Our room was outstanding. We had the best views of the city and of the Hudson River. They left us a personalize note in the room for mine and my husbands anniversary, which I thought was very thoughtful. The room is very modern and has every thing you need when you vacation. The location is great. The restaurant served delicious food. The amenities are great. My favorite was the sauna pods and heated outdoor pool. The views from there were amazing! I would definitely stay here again. Thank you to the staff of The Equinox for making our anniversary an amazing experience!
